creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: 4 figures and 5 oxen at LLC; large wedge and triangular-shaped land forms throughout; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'#10024 \'EARLY TO WORK\'\', in black ink, on back; \'#A-10\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375 USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Early to Work
